Job-Description: The RSM would be responsible for the sales of territory assigned.The RSM should be motivated and willing to make decisions on his/her own. The sales quota and targets would be predefined.The RSM would be leading the local sales team of approx. 5-6 team size.

Experience-required: 7-8 years of experience in FMCG Sales
